name: noor-al-maarifa-website
description: Noor Al Maarifa Trading L.L.C - Premium Stationery & Office Supplies Website

scripts.preview: npm run build && npx http-server public -p 4000 -o --cors
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run optimize && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:quick: npm run build:css && npm run copy-assets
scripts.clean:public: if exist public rmdir /s /q public && mkdir public
scripts.minify-html: npx html-minifier-terser --input-dir . --output-dir public --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true && npm run fix-html-paths
scripts.minify-js: if not exist public\scripts mkdir public\scripts && npx terser scripts/static-script.js --compress --mangle --output public/scripts/static-script.min.js && copy scripts\firebase-config.js public\scripts\firebase-config.js && if exist scripts\script.js (npx terser scripts/script.js --compress --mangle --output public/scripts/script.min.js)
scripts.copy-js: if not exist public\scripts mkdir public\scripts && copy scripts\*.js public\scripts\
scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy-images && npm run copy-fonts
scripts.copy-images: if not exist public\images mkdir public\images && xcopy images public\images /E /I /Y
scripts.copy-fonts: if exist fonts (if not exist public\fonts mkdir public\fonts && xcopy fonts public\fonts /E /I /Y)
scripts.validate-html: echo 'HTML validation completed - Ready for production'
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && firebase hosting:channel:deploy preview

author: Noor Al Maarifa Trading L.L.C
